user_stories.title: Create and manage tasks
user_stories.description: As a Project Manager, I want to create, edit, delete, assign, and prioritize tasks with due dates and statuses, so that I can effectively manage project workflows and delegate responsibilities.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new tasks with a title, description, due date, and priority.
Users can assign tasks to one or multiple team members.
Users can edit existing task details.
Users can delete tasks.
Users can define and update task statuses (e.g., To Do, In Progress, Under Review, Done).
Tasks are displayed in a list or Kanban board view.
Task status changes are reflected in real-time.

user_stories.title: Communicate within tasks
user_stories.description: As a Team Member, I want to add comments and attachments to tasks, so that I can provide updates, ask questions, and share relevant files directly within the context of the task.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add text comments to a task.
Users can upload files (attachments) to a task.
Comments and attachments are visible to all users with access to the task.
New comments and attachments trigger notifications to relevant team members.

user_stories.title: Real-time task updates and notifications
user_stories.description: As a Project Manager and Team Member, I want to receive real-time notifications for task assignments, mentions, comments, and status changes, so that I am always aware of the latest project activity and can respond promptly.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive in-app notifications when a task is assigned to them.
Users receive in-app notifications when they are mentioned in a task comment.
Users receive in-app notifications when a task they are involved in has a status change.
Users receive in-app notifications for new comments on tasks they are assigned to or follow.
Email notifications are sent for critical updates (configurable).
Users can configure basic notification preferences.

user_stories.title: Collaborate via integrated chat and video
user_stories.description: As a Remote Team Member, I want to initiate direct messages and group chats, and participate in video conferences with screen sharing, so that I can communicate effectively with my colleagues without switching applications.
acceptance_criteria: Users can send direct messages to individual team members.
Users can create and participate in group chat channels for projects or teams.
Users can initiate one-on-one video calls.
Users can initiate group video calls.
Users can share their screen during video calls.
Message history is available and searchable within chat conversations.
Users can see the presence status (online, away, in a call) of other team members.

user_stories.title: Manage project documents
user_stories.description: As a Project Manager, I want to upload, store, and organize project-related files with basic version control, so that all necessary documents are easily accessible and trackable in a central location.
acceptance_criteria: Users can upload files to the document repository.
Uploaded files are associated with projects or tasks.
The system automatically saves previous versions when a file is re-uploaded.
Users can organize files into folders or using tags.
Users can perform basic text searches for documents by name or content.
Permissions can be set for viewing and editing documents.

user_stories.title: Monitor team workload and performance
user_stories.description: As a Project Manager, I want to view a dashboard of overall team workload and basic reports on task completion rates and overdue tasks, so that I can assess team productivity and identify potential issues.
acceptance_criteria: A dashboard displays the total number of tasks, tasks in progress, and completed tasks.
Reports show the percentage of tasks completed on time.
Reports highlight the number of overdue tasks.
Users can view the workload distribution among individual team members.

user_stories.title: User authentication and team creation
user_stories.description: As an Administrator, I want to register users, authenticate them securely, and create teams with defined roles, so that I can manage access and structure the organization within the platform.
acceptance_criteria: Users can register using email and password.
Users can register/log in using Google SSO.
Users can register/log in using Microsoft SSO.
Administrators can create new teams.
Administrators can invite users to join teams.
Users can be assigned roles (e.g., Admin, Member).

user_stories.title: View tasks in different formats
user_stories.description: As a Team Member, I want to view my assigned tasks in both a list format and a Kanban board format, so that I can choose the visualization that best suits my workflow and understanding.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view tasks in a sortable list format.
Users can view tasks in a drag-and-drop Kanban board format.
The chosen view (list or board) is persistent or easily switchable.

user_stories.title: Basic document preview
user_stories.description: As a Team Member, I want to preview documents within the application before downloading them, so that I can quickly check the content and relevance of a file.
acceptance_criteria: Users can click on a document attachment to open a preview within the application.
Common file types (e.g., .txt, .pdf, .jpg, .png) are supported for preview.
A clear indication is provided if a file type is not supported for preview.

user_stories.title: Calendar Integration for Task Deadlines
user_stories.description: As a Project Manager, I want to integrate with external calendars (Google Calendar, Outlook Calendar) to display task deadlines, so that I can have a consolidated view of project timelines alongside other scheduled events.
acceptance_criteria: Users can connect their Google Calendar account.
Users can connect their Outlook Calendar account.
Task due dates are automatically reflected as events in the connected calendar.
Changes to task due dates in TeamSync Hub update the calendar events.
